CREATION.RESTORE.KEY_STORE.INPUT.TITLE: Enter keystore
CREATION.RESTORE.KEY_STORE.INPUT.TIPS: Please enter or select your keystore. Keystore can be exported by TronMask or Tronscan. Select file only supports .txt files exported by Tronscan.
CREATION.EXPORT.PRIVATE_KEY.TITLE: Export Private Key
CREATION.EXPORT.MNEMONIC.TITLE: Export Mnemonic Phrase
CREATION.EXPORT.KEYSTORE.TITLE: Export Keystore
CREATION.EXPORT.MNEMONIC.TIP: Here is your mnemonic phrase. Obtaining mnemonic phrase equals owning all assets. Please store it safely. It can not be retrieved it once it gets lost.
CREATION.EXPORT.PRIVATE_KEY.TIP: Here is your private key. Obtaining private key equals owning all assets. Please store it safely. It can not be retrieved it once it gets lost.
CREATION.EXPORT.KEYSTORE.TIP: Here is your keystore. Obtaining keystore and wallet password equals owning all assets. Please store it safely. It can not be retrieved it once it gets lost.

CREATION.LEDGER.NOT_MATCH: Account address does not match Ledger

CREATION_CRITERIA.IS_ALPHANUMERIC: Contains only alphanumeric characters, along with optional spaces
CREATION_CRITERIA.IS_UNIQUE: Is not in use by any of your other accounts
WRITING_PHRASE: Please copy down the mnemonic for your new account below. You will have to confirm the mnemonic on the next screen
CONFIRMING_PHRASE: You must now confirm your mnemonic phrase. Select the words below in the correct order to finalise your account creation
ACCOUNT_NAME.DESC: Please choose a memorable name for your new account
MNEMONIC_IMPORT.DESC: Please enter your mnemonic phrase below. This will either be 12 or 24 words in length (separated by spaces)
MNEMONIC_IMPORT.SELECTION: Select the accounts you would like to import below
PRIVATE_KEY_IMPORT.DESC: Please enter your private key below. This can only contain hexadecimal characters
CONFIRMATIONS.BODY: The website {hostname} is requesting your permission to {action}
CONFIRMATIONS.WHITELIST.TITLE: Enable automatic signature
CONFIRMATIONS.WHITELIST.BODY: Allow TronMask to automatically sign for this DApp
CONFIRMATIONS.AUTO_AUTHORIZE.DESC: Add the app to the white list so it will be authenticated automatically. The pop-up window will also stop showing.
CONFIRMATIONS.APPROVE_TIP: This amount is based on the analysis of the TRC20 standard contract. Please refer to the actual transaction to avoid asset loss.
CONFIRMATIONS.APPROVE_QUESTION_TIP: By signing this request, you allow the other party to transfer your assets or automatically execute the transaction.

EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_NOT_ENOUGH_ERRO: Insufficient bandwidth. Small amount of extra TRX (no more than 1 TRX) will be consumed.
EXCEPTION.SEND.ENERGY_NOT_ENOUGH_ERROR: Insufficient energy. Small amount of extra TRX (no more than 1 TRX) will be consumed.
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_ENERGY_NOT_ENOU: Insufficient energy and bandwidth. Small amount of extra TRX (no more than 1 TRX) will be consumed.
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_NOT_ENOUGH_TRX_: Insufficient bandwidth, a small amount of TRX will be consumed, insufficient TRX balance
EXCEPTION.SEND.ENERGY_NOT_ENOUGH_TRX_ERR: Insufficient Energy, a small amount of TRX will be consumed, insufficient TRX balance
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_ENERGY_NOT_ENOU: Insufficient bandwidth and Energy, a small amount of TRX will be consumed, insufficient TRX balance
EXCEPTION.SEND.ADDRESS_UNACTIVATED_TRC20: The account is not activated, 20token cannot be sent. Please transfer TRX to activate the account.
EXCEPTION.TRANSFER.MAIN_ADDRESS_NO_ACTIV: This account is not activated on the Tron main chain
